title: Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategy Training Using Video Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning course combining real-time video lectures and video modeling techniques to improve mathematical problem-solving skills for current practitioners, assuming 100% digital device ownership among learners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more problem-solving strategies through video modeling examples
After watching modeling videos, learners can independently solve similar problems with over 80% accuracy
Learners can recognize their attention patterns and suggest improvement strategies through eye-tracking analysis during problem-solving processes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
